API_list.name: Sunrun.get_user_growth_data
API_list.description: Retrieve user growth data from Sunrun's platform

required_parameters.name: start_date
required_parameters.description: start date for the data retrieval

required_parameters.name: end_date
required_parameters.description: end date for the data retrieval

return_data.name: user_count
return_data.description: number of users registered during the period

API_list.name: EnergyMarket.analyze_market_changes
API_list.description: Analyze changes in the energy market

required_parameters.name: start_date
required_parameters.description: start date for the market analysis

required_parameters.name: end_date
required_parameters.description: end date for the market analysis

return_data.name: market_trend
return_data.description: trend of the energy market during the period

API_list.name: ConsumerSurvey.get_satisfaction_data
API_list.description: Retrieve consumer satisfaction survey data for shared energy services

return_data.name: satisfaction_score
return_data.description: average satisfaction score from the survey

origin_prompt.content: 我想探究共享经济对能源行业的影响。首先，获取共享经济平台（如Sunrun和SolarCity）的用户增长数据。接着，分析能源市场的变化情况。然后，获取消费者对共享能源的满意度调查数据。最后，基于这些数据，提供一些关于能源市场发展的建议。
